Derived Columns

To be able to frequently re-use a formula expression you defined across multiple sessions, you can save the formula by checking the box at the bottom of the formula editor panel when creating the formula expression:

When you click OK after checking the Re-use box, the column you just defined will now appear in the Derived Column section of the Column Panel.

You can also add and edit your Derived Columns by clicking on the F(x) icon in the Derived Columns header in the column panel.
